Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are functional electrochemical conversion devices whose performance is strongly dependent on electrode microstructure.
Titulo: 3D imaging and quantification of interfaces in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Both the performance and lifetime of these electrochemical devices can be considerably enhanced by the ability to design better electrodes.
Titulo: 3D imaging and quantification of interfaces in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Data acquired from high resolution 3D imaging techniques were used in the quantification of two electrode structures of different compositions.
Titulo: 3D imaging and quantification of interfaces in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The quantified nickel-based anode data through the analysis of particle sizes with their metal metal and ceramic ceramic neck sizes, metal ceramic interface sizes, volume fractions, and triple-phase boundary densities, demonstrate it is possible to understand how microstructure contributes to differences observed in electrochemical and mechanical performance; facilitating optimisation of electrode micro/nano structure towards improved performance.
Titulo: 3D imaging and quantification of interfaces in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: In doing so, new insights are gained that could be used to develop better electrodes.
Titulo: 3D imaging and quantification of interfaces in SOFC anodes
